title.rendered: Seanmag 888 Chlorine Dioxide Water Purification, 100 Tablets

content.rendered:
Product Description

Easy, fast, safe and effective microorganism disinfectant for purifying water.  It kills bacteria, viruses and is regarded for being effective at deactivating chlorine resistant pathogens such as Giardia and Cryptosporidium. It is a must have essential item for any traveller or person if needed in a dire situation to avoid contaminated water. 100 Tablets treats up to 150 L of water.

Specifications

  • Contact time: 30 minutes for bacteria and viruses, 2 hours for Giardia in clear water and 4 hours if water is turbid with suspended particles or very cold in temperature.
  • 1 tablet cleans 1.5 litres of water.
  • Form: Tablets. Shelf-life: 3 years from manufactures date.
  • 100 Tablet box, 1g Chlorine Dioxide tablets.
  • Application: Camping, travelling, emergencies and hiking.
  • Always read the label and product information before use

Key features:

  1. Easy to use
  2. Quality and inexpensive
  3. Safe to store and handle
  4. Lightweight and transportable
  5. Variety of sizes for whatever your needs may be

Benefits:

  • Every family can source water nearby and know that their family can survive due to the safe and clean water provided by the tablets through whatever times they may be facing.
  • Ideal for families during an emergency/post-disaster for when there isn’t space to handle or carry water. Families can be provided a box of whatever size where it will not take up much weight due to the lightness in weight.
  • Effective lightweight tablets which are great for hikers, mountain adventures and camping trips where they can choose purification tablets rather than carry an extra load of water that would take the weight, but it also takes a small amount of space and leaves room for other necessities due to the size of the variety of boxes available.

Access the entire Seanmag 888 product range at wholesale prices through a quick and easy ordering process.
